sentence.Network_cn: 他声明与堕落的儿子脱离关系.

sentence.Network_en: He has always been a bit of a reprobate.
He ventured to reprobate that common system.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很大胆地摈弃了一般常用的那种方式.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... repose vt. 使休息, 寄托于 19。 reprobate v. 非难 21。 impute vt. 归罪于, 归咎于, 归因于 22。.
GRE常用小词_Sam天地自然_新浪博客 ... pirouette 芭蕾中的一种旋转堕落的人 reprobate 节制自制 n.：temperance continence.
黄妙律... ... 311 reprobate:misbehave = sycophant:fawn 无赖汉 : 行为不端 = 奉承者 : 奉承[人及特征动作] accessory n. 附件.

list.abs: God reprobated the unrepenting sinner ., 上帝责难不思悔改的罪人.
the elect 有福的the reprobate 被罚入地狱的grace 恩典,慈悲
You sinful old reprobate !, 你这个作恶多端的无赖!
we thank God for His Holy Spirit who gives us the strength to remain consecrated to Him , even while we live a corrupt and reprobate world .感谢上帝赐下圣灵，因圣灵给我们力量，使我们即使身处败坏、堕落的世界中，仍能过圣洁的生活。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): from Latin reprobat- 'disapproved', from the verb reprobare, from re- (expressing reversal) + probare 'approve'

entry.tran: 堕落者;放荡者;行为不检的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a reprobate, you mean that they behave in a way that is not respectable or morally correct.

sentences.sentence: "We condemn the racism in South Africa"

means.word_mean: 1. marked by immorality; deviating from what is considered right or proper or good;

sentences.sentence: "the reprobate conduct of a gambling aristocrat"
